titleStmt.title: A iust provocation of Master Tombes, to make good his generall charge against Mr VVilliam Hussey's satisfaction to his scepticall exercitation. / By William Hussey, Minister of the Gospell, at Chesilhurst in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Hussey, William, minister of Chiselhurst.

titleStmt.title: A iust provocation of Master Tombes, to make good his generall charge against Mr VVilliam Hussey's satisfaction to his scepticall exercitation. / By William Hussey, Minister of the Gospell, at Chesilhurst in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Hussey, William, minister of Chiselhurst.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Saywell, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Starre in little Brittain.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Tombes, John. Two treatises and an appendix to them concerning infant-baptisme (Wing T1825).
